title: Hou'se My Area
description:
A website to help people look at places to live by comparing crime rates, school locations, house prices etc. The website is aimed at people who are looking to move house.
Crime data is displayed real-time (to the closest month).

shortDescriptions.title: The goal
shortDescriptions.description: Use at least 3 datasets on the internet and create a prototype for a chosen audience.

title: Crochet
description: Crochet projects that vary from Toys to anything else.

title: Camel Carry
description: Camel carry is a puzzle game loosely similar to river crossing problems, where the player must transport items using their camel in the time limit, with different restrictions.

title: Out with the old... In with the new (Musicians of Brehmen)
description: This game was a labour of love! It features a branching story engine with multiple endings and different scenarios.

title: Lithuanian Language Learning App
description:
For my 3rd year project, I created a single page application providing a crash-course introduction to the Lithuanian language. 
To test it, I performed tests with human participants and assessed their Lithuanian knowledge before and after using the app.

shortDescriptions.title: The goal
shortDescriptions.description: Prove that the Lithuanian language can be taught with an online tool.

title: D3 Visualisation and Analaysis
description:
This page was created to solve an issue with data. The issue chosen was - 'Are EU Immigrants Harming the People of the UK?'
The project uses real datasets and utilises interactive charts to include the reader and to draw conclusions with the author.

shortDescriptions.title: Technologies used
shortDescriptions.description: HTML, JavaScript, CSS, D3.js, dc.js, Tableau

title: D3 Visualisation
description:
This project was part of a coursework. The goal was to clean a (very) messy dataset, extract important information from it and to apply it in creating a visualisation. 
The project is presented in terms of an interactive page/report.

shortDescriptions.title: Technologies used
shortDescriptions.description: HTML, JavaScript,CSS, D3.js, OpenRefine, Microsoft Excel

title: About Me
description: My name is Egle Kat and I am a bat.

shortDescriptions.title: Software Engineer Intern, Orthoview
shortDescriptions.description: I made a log file analyser with dynamic graphs.

shortDescriptions.title: Service Delivery Intern, Fidessa
shortDescriptions.description: I designed and implemented a front end for an server-upgrade manager.
